```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
dimy <- 5
vec <- c(0.01,0.01,0.06,0.03,0.02,0.04,0.07,0.04,0.03,0.08,0.09,0.04,0.05,0.11,0.08,0.02,0.13,0.05,0.03,0.01)
m <- matrix(vec, nrow = dimy, byrow = TRUE)
marginalX <- colSums(m) 
marginalY <- rowSums(m)
```

```{r}
meanX <- meanY <- 0

for (col in 0:(ncol(m)-1))
  meanX <- meanX + col*marginalX[col+1]

for (row in 0:(nrow(m)-1))
  meanY <- meanY + row*marginalY[row+1]

print(meanX)
print(meanY)
```

```{r}
varX <- varY <- mX <- mY <- 0

for (col in 1:(ncol(m)-1))
  mX <- mX + (col**2)*marginalX[col+1]
varX <- mX - (meanX**2)

for (row in 1:(nrow(m)-1))
  mY <- mY + (row**2)*marginalY[row+1]
varY <- mY - (meanY**2)

print(varX)
print(varY)
```

```{r}
covXY <- 0
for (r in 1:nrow(m))   
  for (c in 1:ncol(m))
    covXY <- covXY + ((r-1)*(c-1)*m[r, c])
covXY <- covXY - meanX*meanY
covXY
```


```{r}
corrXY <- covXY / (sqrt(varX)*sqrt(varY))
corrXY
```
